description.value:
Prerequisite: Choke

You make a crushing gesture at a creature within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save target takes [[/r 10d8]] force damage and is paralyzed until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not paralyzed.

You can use a bonus action while the target is paralyzed to move the target up to 10 feet in any direction.

Force Potency. When you cast this power using a force slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by [[/r 1d8]] for each slot level above 6th.
